column4: if i install kubuntu-desktop, i'll get to chose between gnome and kde when i log in right?
they do, they also don't inform you though
but my computer hasn't been crippled yet, and its past the grace period
yes, i know about kubuntu-desktop. the problem is it replaces my bootsplash and everything too.
not sure about 'everything' but the usplash is easily reset with:

so the normal interface doesn't work?
I don't know what you mean by "normal interface"
by the way did you see penggy in the repositories?  penggy - connects to AOL via modem or TCP/IP
